definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
(elec.) unidirectional current/DC/also written 直流[zhi2 liu2]

sentences.english: Thermal protector in motor will interrupt current when motor overheats .
sentences.chinese: 電機過熱時，熱保護器將會中斷電流。

sentences.english: The current-loop is a key subsystem of the magnetic levitation controller on maglev vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 電流環是磁浮列車懸浮控制器的重要子系統。

sentences.english: The current through the resistor is several thousandths of an ampere.
sentences.chinese: 該電阻上的電流爲零點零零幾安培。

sentences.english: the recruit made the current circulate in the circuit on the circumference.
sentences.chinese: 補充的電流使其在現行的環形電路內循環。

sentences.english: They consist of electrochemical devices, including one or even more galvanic cells.
sentences.chinese: 它們包括電化學設備，包括一個或更多的電流細胞。

sentences.english: Then there is the change in that charge over time, better known as current.
sentences.chinese: 然後是隨時間而改變的電荷，就是我們知道的電流。

sentences.english: The light-converting efficiency has been researched with photocurrent measurements.
sentences.chinese: 光生電流譜研究了薄膜的光電轉換效率。

sentences.english: Similarly, avoid values that could result in errors due to the reference-input current.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，由於輸入參考電流避免導致誤差的值。

sentences.english: We present a novel current-following SPWM inverter with delay-loop control.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種滯環控制的電流跟蹤型SPWM逆變器。

sentences.english: For this reason, a large static high-level output current is not required.
sentences.chinese: 因此，無需大靜態高電平輸出電流。

sentences.english: By manipulating the energy states, they were able to control the current passing through the molecule.
sentences.chinese: 採用這一方法，研究員可以控制穿越分子的電流。

sentences.english: A composite formula for calculation of horizontal electric field generated by return stroke current is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種計算地閃回擊電流水平電場的混合法。

sentences.english: By optimizing the object function, the feeding currents of column are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 通過優化目標函數，得到所需的單元饋電電流。

sentences.english: He had an inherent interest in induced current and in the induction field.
sentences.chinese: 他對感應電流和感應電場有着內在的興趣。

sentences.english: Known applications include electrical shunts which control and measure the actual current through devices.
sentences.chinese: 已知的應用有用於控制和測量電流的電氣分流器。

definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
